profile.name: Ray Holloman
profile.headline: Director, Marketing and Communications at NJVC-LLC
profile.summary:
Digital first marketing and communications director delivering multi-platform content which educates, informs and inspires passion in brands and missions. Leveraging best practices of journalism and 15 years of digital media to drive engaging editorial and memorable marketing that allows companies to exceed business goals and agencies to achieve mission.

Key Highlights
• Leading marketing and strategic communications efforts of defense and intelligence community contractor, including all aspects of website redesign, brand, and portfolio realignment
• Responsible for all aspects of award-winning redesign of NJVC.com, including content creation editorial, technical support and metrics reporting
• Successfully relaunched capabilities and increased customer favorability through integrated Mission CrITical campaign, winner of Communicator Award of Excellence
• Served as communications director for defense contractor, overseeing all internal and external communications
• Managed editorial team of 12+ writers nationwide for15MM monthly UV site, AOL Sports/FanHouse.com
• Achieved 3,000% audience growth at FanHouse with proven, repeatable, content and earned-media strategy
• TS/SCI clearance with CI poly
